long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SnappyNotes

Your notes are always at hand, directly in your browser!

What you can do:

- Create multiple notes: For any subject.
- Copy, save, edit, and delete: Quick and easy.
- Use shortcuts to add your notes directly to Google Calendar and Outlook.

Examples of use:

- Shopping lists.
- Project ideas.
- And much more!

Simple, practical, and efficient.

Your feedback is invaluable to me! Please take a moment to rate the extension and suggest any improvements. My goal as an independent developer is to enhance the daily experience of computer users, making it easier and more productive. If you believe the extension has positively impacted your routine, I would greatly appreciate your support through a donation via PayPal. Thank you for your generosity! ðŸ˜Š

Best regards,**

Leandro!
